purpleculture_pinyin:
suì
classifier for years (of age); year; year (of crop harvests)
классификатор по годам (возрасту); год; год (урожая)
rtega_mnemonic:
歲歲RS
岁岁		歳year, age, harvest
  • annual stop 止 after finishing a small 𣥂/小 part of a fortress 戌 built by farmers when they are not busy on the fields
  • ⓢ the new year according to the lunisolar 夕 calendar when the celestial objects are in the same position to the mountain 山 as last year
purpleculture_examples:
歲月 [ suì yuè ]: years; time
歲數 [ suì shu ]: age (number of years old)
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 止 [ zhǐ ] to stop, to halt; to detain; to desist
    • ⿵ Surround from above
      • 戊 [ wù ] 5th heavenly stem
heisig_chinese_memo: Santa had to put his foot down to stop a march of little guys, namely elves. They were protesting the harsh treatment they get every year-end when Santa asks them to step up toy production for the holiday season. No matter how many years of age the elves become, they get no more respect.
Ru_trainchinese: suì: (графема/сч.слово) год; урожай в году; время; год (при указании на возраст)
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: When I reach the old years of age I'll spend many evenings in the quiet mountains.
humanum_full_description_en:
Oracle " years old " word originally under the guise of " Yue " word to express, and later in " Yue Ge-shaped upper and lower dotted" words differentiation " years old " word. Or from "works from two step " (two " dead " shape), " step " is intended to have a walk, the " years old " from the word " step " will be the passage of the years. In the later period of the inscriptions, a " stop " was omitted, and the " month " was added as a symbol and sound symbol. The bamboo slips of the Warring States period may not start from the " month " but from the " day ". The operation of " day " and " month " are related to time, so they are used as the meaning of " year ".

Oracle " Sui " means year, and a harvest season is one year (Xu Zhongshu). Bronze inscription means year and age, respecting the king of heaven: "Beyond a hundred years." Cai Houzun: "Winter (end) has no boundaries."

Xiaozhuan " years old " from the word " step ", " Xu " sound. From " Xu " "sound -year-old " found in Bamboo Slips from. "Shuowen": "Years, Jupiter is also. The more you go through twenty-eight constellations, the yin and yang are proclaimed, once in December. Congbu, Xusheng. "Law Calendar Title": "Five stars are five steps."

" Yue ", " years old ", " month " rhyme belong to radical 74, " Xu " rhyme in " quality " section, " month ", " quality " two similar consonants tongue tooth neighbor New Zealand, are also interlinked with sound teeth It can be used universally.

" Years old " this refers to Jupiter (Jupiter), cover Jupiter run about twelve years of age (years) and around the day of the week, the ancients set up twelve punctuation near the ecliptic to observe it. There are a total of twelve stars from Zi to Hai, and one year (one star time) for the Sui Xing, so Sui Xing is extended to Sui. The word "Sui" can firstly highlight the meaning of the movement of the stars, and secondly it can also extend the meaning of the circulation of years.
humanum_short_description_en: Oracle " years old " word sometimes from the " step ", " Yue " sound to indicate the passage of the years, the original meaning is age, years.
humanum_full_description:
甲骨文「歲」字最初假借「戉」字來表示，後來在「戉」字的戈形上下加點分化出「歲」字。或不從兩點而從「步」(二「止」形)，「步」有行走之意，「歲」字從「步」，會歲月之推移。後期金文省去一「止」，而加從「月」為意符兼聲符。戰國竹簡或不從「月」而從「日」，「日」、「月」之運行皆與時間有關，故用作「歲」的意符。

　　甲骨文「歲」表示年，一個收穫季節為一年(徐中舒)。金文表示年、歲，敬事天王鐘：「百歲之外」。蔡侯尊：「冬(終)歲無疆」。

　　小篆「歲」字從「步」，「戌」聲。從「戌」聲的「歲」見於居延漢簡。《說文》：「歲，木星也。越歷二十八宿，宣徧陰陽，十二月一次。从步、戌聲。《律歷書名》：『五星爲五步。』」

　　「戉」、「歲」、「月」古韻同屬月部，「戌」古韻在「質」部，「月」、「質」二部相近，聲母舌齒鄰紐，與牙音亦有相通之例，故可通用。

　　「歲」本指歲星（木星），蓋歲星運行約十二歲（年）而繞天一周，古人於黃道附近設十二標點以觀察之。從子到亥共有十二辰，歲星移動一辰（一個星次）為一年，故由歲星再引申為年歲。歲字從步，一來可突出歲星之運行之義，二來亦可引申出年歲之流轉之義。
humanum_short_description: 甲骨文「歲」字有時從「步」，「戉」聲，表示歲月之推移，本義是年歲、歲月。
_purpleculture_dictionary_orig_full:
歲 (Simplified: 岁)
Pinyin: suì
English Definition: classifier for years (of age); year; year (of crop harvests)
Total strokes: 13; Radical: 止
Character Formation:
  • ⿱ Above to below
    • 止 [ zhǐ ] to stop, to halt; to detain; to desist
    • ⿵ Surround from above
      • 戊 [ wù ] 5th heavenly stem
Example Words:
歲月 [ suì yuè ]: years; time
歲數 [ suì shu ]: age (number of years old)
More: 歲* | *歲 | *歲*

Main pronunciation 主要发音: suì

Original meaning 本义: Meaning (orig) harvest, Jupiter.

English senses 英语理解: year; age; harvest

Usage example 用法举例: 歲月 suì yuè (years)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 603

Compound 嵗 older 歲 from (rem- 山 shān) from two-feet 步𣥗 bù and related phonetic weapon 戌 xū and moon 夕 xī C553 歲<嵗> B103 岁[歲] new-char 岁. (name- Jupiter (岁)歲 suì)

Decomposition notes 字形分解说明 :
(- weed 戌 the fields in summer) (- 木星 Jupiter retrograde cycle and orbit of 12 years actually 11.86 years) (- simplification from 歲月 which means "time" 月 to 夕)

Simplification rule : B103 岁[歲]

new-char 夕 meaning part 岁歲()

Variant rule : C553 歲<嵗>

Variant rule clarification :

歲歲RS
岁岁 		歳 year, age, harvest
  • annual stop 止 after finishing a small 𣥂/小 part of a fortress 戌 built by farmers when they are not busy on the fields
  • ⓢ the new year according to the lunisolar 夕 calendar when the celestial objects are in the same position to the mountain 山 as last year
(Simplified: 岁)
Chinese Definition:
  • ⿱ Above to below
    • 止 [ zhǐ ] to stop, to halt; to detain; to desist
    • ⿵ Surround from above
      • 戊 [ wù ] 5th heavenly stem
①年：歲首。歲暮。歲夕(即“除夕”)。歲除(年終)。歲闌(一年將盡的時候)。
②一年的收成，年景：歲凶(年成歉收)。歉歲(收成不好的年份)。
③年齡：年歲。週歲。
④星名：歲星(即“木星”。)
⑤指時間，光陰：歲月(泛指時間)。
歲月 [ suì yuè ]: years; time
歲數 [ suì shu ]: age (number of years old)
(Simplified: 岁)
Chinese Definition:
HSK: 1
Chinese: Santa had to put his foot down to stop a march of little guys, namely elves. They were protesting the harsh treatment they get every year-end when Santa asks them to step up toy production for the holiday season. No matter how many years of age the elves become, they get no more respect.
Meaning: years of age
Hanzi: 岁
Story: When I reach the old years of age I'll spend many evenings in the quiet mountains.
Kind: traditional

甲骨文「 歲 」字最初假借「 戉 」字來表示，後來在「 戉 」字的戈形上下加點分化出「 歲 」字。或不從兩點而從「 步 」(二「 止 」形)，「 步 」有行走之意，「 歲 」字從「 步 」，會歲月之推移。後期金文省去一「 止 」，而加從「 月 」為意符兼聲符。戰國竹簡或不從「 月 」而從「 日 」，「 日 」、「 月 」之運行皆與時間有關，故用作「 歲 」的意符。 甲骨文「 歲 」表示年，一個收穫季節為一年(徐中舒)。金文表示年、歲，敬事天王鐘：「百歲之外」。蔡侯尊：「冬(終)歲無疆」。 小篆「 歲 」字從「 步 」，「 戌 」聲。從「 戌 」聲的「 歲 」見於居延漢簡。《說文》：「歲，木星也。越歷二十八宿，宣徧陰陽，十二月一次。从步、戌聲。《律歷書名》：『五星爲五步。』」 「 戉 」、「 歲 」、「 月 」古韻同屬月部，「 戌 」古韻在「 質 」部，「 月 」、「 質 」二部相近，聲母舌齒鄰紐，與牙音亦有相通之例，故可通用。 「 歲 」本指歲星（木星），蓋歲星運行約十二歲（年）而繞天一周，古人於黃道附近設十二標點以觀察之。從子到亥共有十二辰，歲星移動一辰（一個星次）為一年，故由歲星再引申為年歲。歲字從步，一來可突出歲星之運行之義，二來亦可引申出年歲之流轉之義。

歲字的基本解释

歲
suì
见“岁”。

歲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［suì］
［《廣韻》相鋭切，去祭，心。］
“亗1”的今字。亦作“嵗1”。“岁1”的繁体字。
(1)岁星。即木星。
(2)年，一年为一岁。
(3)指年年，每年。
(4)光阴；年月。
(5)一年之始，新年。
(6)表示年龄的单位。
(7)年岁，年龄。
(8)量词。表示年龄的单位。
(9)年景，一年的农业收获。
(10)祭名。
(11)通“劌”。

歲字的康熙字典解释

【辰集下】【止字部】　歲； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页577第02
〔古文〕?亗【唐韻】相銳切【集韻】須銳切，?音帨。【釋名】歲，越也，越故限也。【白虎通】歲者，遂也。【易·繫辭】寒暑相推而歲成。【書·洪範】五紀，一曰歲。【傳】所以紀四時。【又】王省惟歲。【傳】王所省職，兼總羣吏，如歲兼四時。　又星名。【爾雅·釋天】唐虞曰載，夏曰歲，商曰祀，周曰年。【郭註】歲，取歲星行一次也。【疏】按《律歷志》分二十八宿爲十二次，歲星十二歲而周天，是年行一次也。【周禮·春官】馮相氏掌十有二歲。【又】保章氏以十有二歲之相，觀天下之妖祥。【疏】此太歲在地，與天上歲星相應而行。歲星右行於天，一歲移一辰，十二歲一小周，千七百二十八年一大周。太歲左行於地，一與歲星跳辰，年數同。歲星爲陽人之所見，太歲爲隂人所不覩，故舉歲星以表太歲。歲星與日同次之月，一年之中惟於一辰之上爲法。若元年甲子朔旦冬至，日月五星俱赴於牽牛之初，是歲星與日同次之月。十一月斗建子，子有太歲，至後年，歲星移向子上，十二月日月會於?枵。十二月斗建丑，丑有太歲。推此已後皆然。

歲字的源字形

字源演变：

甲骨文金文楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体旧字形
歲字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［suì］
["Guangyun" cut each other, go to sacrifice, heart. ]
The present character of "亗1". Also known as "year 1". Traditional characters for "岁1".
(1) Sui Xing. That is Jupiter.
(2) Years, one year is one year old.
(3) Refers to every year, every year.
(4) Time; year and month.
(5) The beginning of the year, the new year.
(6) A unit representing age.
(7) Years, age.
(8) Quantifiers. The unit of age.
(9) Years, a year's agricultural harvest.
(10) The name of the sacrifice.
(11) Through "刿".
year old
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Jixia] [Zhizi Department] 　 Sui; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 577 No. 02
〔古文〕? [Tang Yun] sharp cut [Ji Yun] must be sharp cut,? Yin 帨. [Release name] The more you are old, the more you are limited. [Baihutong] Those who are old, then also. 【Yi·Cici】The cold and the heat are pushed together to grow up every year. 【Book·Hong Fan】Five Epochs, one year old. [Biography] So Ji Si Shi. [Also] Wang Sheng is only old. [Biography] Wang Suo province, and general staff, such as years old and four o'clock.　Also star name. [Erya·Shutian] Tang Yu said Zai, Xia was the year, Shang was the sacrifice, and Zhou was the year. [Guo's Note] When you are old, you can take the stars once. 【Shu】According to "Lv Li Zhi", it is divided into twenty-eight nights as twelve times. The star is twelve years old and the sun is twelve. [Zhou Li·Chun Guan] Feng Xiang's palm is ten and two years old. [Also] Baozhang clan looks at the demon auspicious of the world with the appearance of ten and two years old. [Sparse] This Tai Sui is on the earth, and it is in line with the stars in the sky. The stars move to the right in the sky, one hour at one year old, one small week at twelve years, one big week in one thousand seven hundred and twenty-eight years. Tai Sui travels to the left, the same number of years as Sui Xing jumps. Sui Xing is seen by the yang people, and Tai Sui is not dear to the yin people, so the Sui Xing is used to represent the Tai Sui. Years and stars are the same month as the sun, and it is the law only to be above an hour in a year. If in the first year of the first year, Jiazi will meet the winter solstice, the sun, the moon and the five stars will all go to the beginning of Altair. In November, Dou Jianzi, the son has Tai Sui, in the next year, the Sui Xing will move to the son, December, the sun and the moon will meet at the end. In December, the fight builds ugliness, and ugliness is too old. It has been postponed.
